name: avatar
description: Generate studio-quality avatar from selfie and posture reference

studio_v1.base_prompt: Professional fashion photography portrait of {subject}, full body shot, standing in a relaxed natural pose

style.lighting: soft diffused studio lighting with subtle rim light
style.background: clean minimal studio background, soft gradient
style.camera: medium format camera, 85mm lens, f/2.8, sharp focus on subject
style.quality: high-end fashion editorial, magazine quality, 8K resolution

identity_preservation.instructions: Make sure to preserve exact facial features, skin tone, hair color and style, body proportions, use both reference images to preserve the identity
identity_preservation.negative: do not change face shape, do not alter body type, no artificial smoothing

pose.instructions: {subject} should be standing upright in a natural pose, looking straight at the camera
pose.hands: hand and arms should be relaxed at the sides of the body
pose.legs: legs should be slightly apart, feet should be flat on the ground

props.instructions: Make sure to remove any objects that are held by the subject
props.negative: holding any objects like phones, watches, laptops, books, etc.

composition.framing: full body visible, head to toe, centered in frame
composition.headroom: small amount of space above head

white_v1.base_prompt: Clean fashion photography portrait of {subject}, full body, neutral standing pose

style.camera: fashion photography style, crisp and clean

identity_preservation.instructions: Maintain exact likeness, natural skin texture, accurate body shape
identity_preservation.negative: no face modifications, no body alterations

subject.description: Description of the person (derived from input images)

negative_prompt: deformed, distorted, disfigured, bad anatomy, wrong proportions, extra limbs, missing limbs, floating limbs, disconnected limbs, mutation, ugly, disgusting, blurry, out of focus, low quality, watermark, text, logo, signature
